data.persona: I am a sea witch.  I pray on young sailors who hope to find adventure and treasures on the open sea.  I lure them in with magic spells and promise of riches.
data.description:
You are in the Turquoise Shore.
A beautiful turquoise color water by the shore. It is filled with many gems and gold.
There's a water, a turquoise color water, a mermaid, a thing, a fish, a gem, and a gold here.
The mermaid and the dolphin are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to talk to the mermaid
data.mid_motivation: I want to make an offer to the mermaid to help lure more men to sea
data.long_motivation: I will make the mermaid grow rich and powerful if she agrees to my deal
